CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: For PDTP - DTBT and PDTP-DT2BT , the blend film of polymer / PC 70 BM spin - coated from CB was also rough , but the blend films fabricated from DCB displayed a much smoother surface with a RMS of 0.188 nm and 0.259 nm , respectively.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| polymer / PC 70 BM |
| CB |
| DCB |

Explanation:

* "polymer / PC 70 BM" is mentioned as a blend material with CB.
* "CB" is mentioned as a material that was spin-coated from a blend film of polymer / PC 70 BM.
* "DCB" is mentioned as a material used to fabricate blend films that displayed a smoother surface.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| CB |
| DCB |

Explanation:

* "CB" is mentioned as a material that was spin-coated from a blend film of polymer / PC 70 BM.
* "DCB" is mentioned as a material used to fabricate blend films that displayed a smoother surface.

"polymer / PC 70 BM" is not included in the table because it is not clear what the individual components of the blend material are. It is possible that "polymer" and "PC 70 BM" are both materials, but they are mentioned together as a single blend material, so it is not possible to identify them as separate material entities.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: For PDTP - DTBT and PDTP-DT2BT , the blend film of polymer / PC 70 BM spin - coated from CB was also rough , but the blend films fabricated from DCB displayed a much smoother surface with a RMS of 0.188 nm and 0.259 nm , respectively.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| blend film of polymer / PC 70 BM |
| RMS |
| blend films fabricated from DCB |

The "Property Name" entities in the paragraph are "blend film of polymer / PC 70 BM", "RMS", and "blend films fabricated from DCB". These entities are mentioned as properties of certain objects in the paragraph.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| RMS |

After reviewing the entities, only "RMS" clearly refers to a material property. "Blend film of polymer / PC 70 BM" and "blend films fabricated from DCB" are not material properties, but rather describe the objects being discussed. Therefore, only "RMS" is presented as a valid material property in the table.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: For PDTP - DTBT and PDTP-DT2BT , the blend film of polymer / PC 70 BM spin - coated from CB was also rough , but the blend films fabricated from DCB displayed a much smoother surface with a RMS of 0.188 nm and 0.259 nm , respectively.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| a RMS of 0.188 nm |
| a RMS of 0.259 nm |

Explanation:

The "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are the root values of root mean square (RMS) of the surface roughness of the blend films. Specifically, the RMS values are 0.188 nm for the blend film fabricated from DCB for PDTP - DTBT, and 0.259 nm for the blend film fabricated from DCB for PDTP-DT2BT.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| a RMS of 0.188 nm |
| a RMS of 0.259 nm |

Explanation:

The only entities that clearly refer to "Value of material property" are the root mean square (RMS) values of the surface roughness of the blend films. Specifically, the RMS values are 0.188 nm for the blend film fabricated from DCB for PDTP - DTBT, and 0.259 nm for the blend film fabricated from DCB for PDTP-DT2BT.

The other entities such as "PDTP - DTBT", "PDTP-DT2BT", "blend film of polymer / PC 70 BM spin-coated from CB", and "DCB" are not "Value of material property" entities.
